ctx: intros n m x Dx Hn Hm.
exceptions.tactic: specialize (H n m x Dx Hn Hm).
exceptions.exn: In environment fn : nat -> R -> R D : R -> Prop eps : posreal N : nat H : forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> forall x : R, D x -> Rabs (fn n x - Lim_seq (fun n0 : nat => fn n0 x)) < eps n, m : nat x : R Dx : D x Hn : (N <= n)%nat Hm : (N <= m)%nat The term "m" has type "nat" while it is expected to have type "(N <= n)%nat".

ctx: intros n m x Dx Hn Hm.
exceptions.exn: In environment fn : nat -> R -> R D : R -> Prop eps : posreal N : nat H : forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> forall x : R, D x -> Rabs (fn n x - Lim_seq (fun n0 : nat => fn n0 x)) < eps n, m : nat x : R Dx : D x Hn : (N <= n)%nat Hm : (N <= m)%nat Unable to unify "Rabs (fn ?M2376 ?M2378 - Lim_seq (fun n : nat => fn n ?M2378)) < eps" with "Rabs (fn n x - fn m x) < eps".

ctx: intros n m x Dx Hn Hm.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros n m x Dx Hn Hm.
exceptions.tactic: intros n m x Dx Hn Hm.

ctx: intros n m x Dx Hn Hm.
exceptions.tactic: apply (H (S O) n m x Dx (le_n (S O)) (le_n (S O))).
exceptions.exn: The reference m was not found in the current environment.

original: unfold CVU_dom, CVU_cauchy. intros fn D. split. - intros H eps. specialize (H eps). destruct H as [N H]. exists N. intros n m x Dx Hn Hm. specialize (H n m x Dx Hn Hm). apply H. - intros H eps. exists (S O). intros n m x Dx Hn Hm. apply (H (S O) n m x Dx (le_n (S O)) (le_n (S O))).
